com.phunware.alerts
Class PwAlertsRegister

java.lang.Object
  com.phunware.alerts.PwAlertsRegister

public final class PwAlertsRegister
extends java.lang.Object

Use this to register, unregister, and initialize Alert service.
When the Alerts module is first installed (either a fresh install, or first time running with Alerts module) a call is made to register the device for push alerts. Registration can be manually triggered by using register(Context) and unregister(Context). They should be called asynchronously and outside of the UI thread.

Constructor Detail

PwAlertsRegister

public PwAlertsRegister()
Method Detail

register

public static void register(android.content.Context context)
Use this to initialize the registration process. This will not re-register or send any duplicate requests. If the app is already registered then a message will be broadcasted using action BROADCAST_MESSAGE_ACTION with the message stored under the key Utils.BROADCAST_MESSAGE_KEY

To unregister, use unregister(Context)

Parameters:
context - A Context the application context

hasRegistered

public static boolean hasRegistered(android.content.Context context)
Determine if Alerts service has been registered

Parameters:
context - A Context the application context
Returns:
true if the device is registered, false if not.

sendPositiveClick

public static void sendPositiveClick(android.content.Context context,
                                     java.lang.String pid)
Send a positive click to server when an incoming alert message has been clicked. Positive click means that an incoming alert message has been viewed. This isn't required but is suggested.

Parameters:
context - context to work with
pid - Alert's PID. PID can be found in the Alert's extras when an alert is received from the GCMIntentService class. PwAlertExtras.getDataPID()

unregister

public static void unregister(android.content.Context context)
Unregistering Alert Service. Register with register(Context).

Parameters:
context - A Context the application context

deviceGCMToken

public static java.lang.String deviceGCMToken(android.content.Context context)
